latestIgtvVideos.caption:
We are Pearlpet, spreading & storing happiness since 1984. We are your trusted houseware & kitchenware companion. We specialise in storage solutions & design for the 21st century. We are back with an all new look. NEW. Just for YOU.

How do you like our new look? Comment below & let us know 🙌🏻

latestPosts.caption:
🎁💖 Love, but make it fresh & delicious! 💖🎁

Forget the usual gifts—create a heartfelt hamper filled with all their favorite goodies, sealed fresh in Pearlpet jars! 🫙🍪 Because nothing says I love you like a surprise packed with love & food! 😍✨

Tag someone who deserves a sweet surprise today! 💌

#ValentinesDay #MadeWithLove #GiftFromTheHeart #Pearlpet #SealedWithLove #FreshnessLocked #SurpriseThemRight

💋 Sealed with a kiss... and Pearlpet’s lasting love! 💋

A kiss is sweet, but what’s sweeter? Heart-shaped macaroons stored fresh in Pearlpet jars! 😍✨ Let love (and freshness) overflow this Kiss Day! 💖

Drop a 💋 if you’re celebrating with something sweet today! 🍪❤️

#KissDay #SweetnessLocked #Pearlpet #Love #SealedWithAKiss #FreshnessThatLasts #LoveInEveryBite

A hug speaks a thousand words, and so do our bottles! 🤗💙

This Hug Day, let’s celebrate bonds that stay strong—just like Pearlpet bottles, sealing in purity and strength for a lifetime! 💖💪 
Because some connections (and bottles) are made to last forever! 🥰✨

Tag someone who gives the best hugs! 🤗💞

#HugDay #HugOfPurity #Pearlpet #SealedWithLove #EverlastingBonds #FreshnessLocked #StayHydrated

latestPosts.caption:
Promises, coffee, and fresh snacks—sounds like the perfect love language! ☕💕

This Promise Day, make a vow that lasts—just like the freshness of snacks stored in Pearlpet’s airtight Click n Seal containers! Because some things, like love (and crispy namkeen), are meant to be preserved forever! 😍✨

Tag your forever person and make them a promise today! 🤝💖

Anyway, what do you prefer? 

#ClicknSeal #PromiseDay #UnbreakablePromises #UnshakableBonds #PearlpetLove #ChaiAndPromises #FreshnessSealed #ValentinesVibes

Teddy Day hugs are cute… but have you hugged your bottle today? 😍🤗

Coziness isn’t just for teddy bears—our Pearlpet bottles give you the same satisfying feeling! 💖 Whether it’s hydration on the go or a sip of freshness anytime, these bottles are here to stay… just like your favorite teddy! 🧸✨

Tag your favorite hug buddy and show them some love! ❤️

#TeddyDay #HugTheHydration #Pearlpet #SipWithLove #StayFresh #PuritySealed #WarmHugsAndFreshSips #ValentinesVibes

latestPosts.caption:
Some love stories start with a chocolate... 🍫💕 But how do you keep the magic alive? By storing it right!

With Pearlpet Gift Sets, your chocolates stay fresh, delicious, and ready for those sweet surprise moments! ✨ 
Keep the love (and chocolates) locked in and savor every bite! 😍

Tag your chocolate-loving Valentine and spread the sweetness! 💖

#ChocolateDay #SweetLoveStored #Pearlpet #SealedWithLove #FreshnessLocked #ChocolateLovers #IndulgeRight
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Pearlpet on February 08, 2025. May be an image of chocolate bar, hamper and text.

latestPosts.caption:
"Umm....Dal today?" Sure... but with a side of surprise! 😉💛

She opened the Pearlpet Pure Jar for fresh, moisture-free dal, but what she found was even sweeter—an adorable proposal! 🥹💌✨ Because when love is real, it deserves to be stored fresh... just like your pantry essentials! 😍

Tag your forever valentine and remind them that love (and good storage) lasts forever! 💖

#ProposeDay #Pearlpet #Pure #LoveStoredFresh #WillYouBeMyValentine #SealedWithLove #DalBhiPyaarBhi #PerfectProposal #ValentinesWeek

latestPosts.caption:
Rose in our dabba? Now that’s how you start Valentine’s Week! 🌹😍

Store your love, seal the freshness, and let the romance begin with our Melody Jar! 💕✨ Because when it comes to love (and snacks), freshness matters! 😍
